title: Did Kr$na diss Emiway in the 'Say My Name' song? - Quora

response.answer_text: He dissed him subliminally just like emiway did him in his past 13 songs, and only a few bars were enough to provoke him to post bullshit about him on his stories. Say My Name by KR$NA created history, the only song released in two languages Hindi and English. Believe me he is the real OG in DHH.
